title: Total synthesis of (−)-2-oxo epimesembranol and (+)-dihydromaritidine via a key Johnson–Claisen rearrangement
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29395-29403
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05275G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Satyajit Majumder, Abhinay Yadav, Souvik Pal, Abhishek Mondal, Alakesh Bisai
The total synthesis of (−)-2-oxo-epimesembranol (11b), (−)-6-epimesembranol (11d), (–)-mesembrine (11e) and dihydromaritidine (2c) has been achieved via a ester aminolysis-aza-Michael sequence of an enantioenriched enone intermediate 7b.
